purpose: The email announces an extended deadline for paper submissions to the Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO) until June 14th, 2025. It encourages ontology-engineering enthusiasts to submit their work, emphasizing the potential impact of even small ideas. The email also provides details about various workshops and important dates related to the submission and registration process.
evidence_sentences: The submission deadline of all JOWO workshops has been extended to June 14th, 2025.
Donâ€™t hesitate, even a small idea can have huge impact.
We welcome your work within the communities of Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO).
JOWO is co-hosted with the 15th International Conference on Formal Ontology in Information Systems (FOIS), held at Catania from September 8-12, 2025.
Workshop paper submission deadline: 25 May 2025 1 June 14 June 2025.
